Reviews.Title: The HP Version of the Macbook Air
Reviews.Author: RICK BARRERA
Reviews.Content: Love it! It is small, light and FAST! I bought the double 256k solid state drives and it boots in seconds. I bump the touchpad when typing sometimes and the cursor moves. Battery life is 3-4 hours. Those are a bit annoying but otherwise I love it. Best laptop I have ever owned and I had my last HP for 5 years because I loved it so much. Just do it! You'll be happy. The screen is AMAZING! You might even say "Insanely Great!" The extra power supply is stupidly expensive, just like...

Reviews.Title: 3 pixels are down
Reviews.Author: Preda Liviu Florin
Reviews.Content: After I received the laptop I made update to bios (hp center told me to do it). After update the laptop didn't started.I send it in service. The motherboard crash. Now I get it back and I do not know if I should do update or not to bios.Now after 2 weeks of use 3 pixels are down.The design is not perfect for such a laptop. The top margin edge is not well fixed. The SPACE key from the keyboard is bent.(Sorry for my english)
